# rsqrt(epsilon:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an element-wise rsqrt operation to the current graph.

## Declaration

```swift
func rsqrt(epsilon: Float = .ulpOfOne.squareRoot()) -> BNNSGraph.Builder.Tensor<T>
```
